Social Media Day is an annual event, created by Mashable, centered on our connectedness and that aims to celebrate all that is social media.  Social Media Day Phoenix is bringing the local community together through social interaction, both on- and off-line.

Qapproved is one of the first comprehensive food allergy certifications that builds a network of allergy-conscious restaurants, hotels, schools, or any establishment that serves food to the public. We make that network accessible to diners everywhere, allowing them to make safer dining decisions. Raising awareness is part of the Qapproved mission, as well as providing a reasonable solution to this growing problem. We are continuously seeking new establishments to certify and promote. Join the movement.

Developed subsidiary brand to cater to the needs of restaurant and food-oriented clients of QtheBrand, through consulting, education, or promotion. Clients ranged from individual diners and families to large corporations like Marriott International. Provided delicious meals for diverse audiences with a wide range of cuisine preferences and nutritional needs. Specialized in addressing food allergies and restricted diets. Managed culinary and delivery staff, while maintaining quality and consistent standards. Conducted food and nutrition classes/demonstrations that also encompassed menu-planning, purchasing, or recipe development. Managed all accounting, product sourcing, staffing, cooking, presentation, scheduling, and event planning. Created systems at every opportunity to streamline processes and to effectively produce in high-stress environments and tight timeframes. Developed hospitality and media industry connections. Utilized communications and online/offline social reach (5+ million) to provide educational and promotional content.

Monique was placed in a highly productive & essential role to a growing home loan division of Countrywide.  She had many moving priorities & multiple responsibilities that never escaped her attention.  Her involvement in that office was key to their continued growth & success, not to mention invaluable to her loan officer.  On many occasions I witnessed the loan officer have Monique handle critical details with both her business & personal life to thereby be more effective for her loan clients.  Monique made the many facets of their office work, and provided a clearing to her loan officer to be successful.  You couldn't ask for a more capable or diligent colleague in any endeavor you embark upon.
